name: Sonic Generations Remastered Episode 1
description: Sonic Generations Reimagined is a sonic game where you can blast through levels with sonic speed! Sonic fan game made in the bumper engine. Episode 1 contains Green Hill Act 2 Ripped from Generations and Wave coast ripped from 06. Uses GT physics. Sorry about crap screenshots had to compress for itch.io limitations. Game is 96 Mb
